name: Equalizer - Bass Booster & Volume Booster
description: Music Equalizer is aneasy-to-useEqualizer with Bass booster, Volume booster and 3D Virtualizer effects!     Customize music listening experience withbass booster & equalizerand feel like never before!   Equalizer Key Features:  4 cool themes  Bass boost effect  Media volume control  Stereo surround sound effect  Revolving edge lighting lamp  Bass booster for headphones  Colorful music visualization spectrum  5 bands equalizer ( If the system is android 9.0: 10 bands equalizer)  10 presets equalizations(Normal, Classic, Dance, Flat, Folk, Heavy Metal, Hip Hop, Jazz, Pop, Rock)   Improve the sound of your music even simpler and elegant!  Sound booster really perfect your music listening experience with the equalizer!  Amazing equalizer is an all-in-one bass booster - volume booster, that offers brilliant sound quality!
